live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. A further update can be expected by 10:50 MT”
56224.summary: Some customers in the Red Deer College area of Red Deer are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
56224.title: Dec 17 - Red Deer (Red Deer College) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
